Folks,

I'm having trouble building heritrix from 1.14.1 and 2 sources.
Par=
t of the problem is my unfamiliarity with maven, 
jelly, qdox, etc.
The pro=
blems are around "qdox" (version "current" -- which 
actual version does th=
is correspond to?) and vdoclet (1.2),
specifically: 

 /maven-vdoclet-plugi=
n-1.2/plugin.jelly (line 38)
Element... vdoclet:vdocletBean

Perhaps I've t=
ried forcing the wrong version of qdox
(copied from i'm not sure where) via=
 the override mechanism.
If I don't do this, it doesn't seem to know where =
to get
qdox-current.jar from (I think someone stopped distributing it).

Ca=
n someone try building from source, and verify that the
release should actu=
ally build and download what it needs,
and if not provide the appropriate .=
jars in the release?

The reason I'm doing this is the version doesn't seem=

ually I could switch to the new version, but the older
